title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any LangChain abstraction with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, async & reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface to generate and chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, syntax highlighting, prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine for VS Code.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for Ollama; cross-platform, offline, no Electron.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and Unity.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama container with chosen model for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate for Ollama; strongly typed, async tokio client.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; small surface, idiomatic error handling.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models; slash commands, threads.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to summarize notes, generate flashcards, answer questions using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama completions into channels/DMs with streaming replies.
